content: the directions state to use steel crochet hook size 9 or 10 but normally one would use size 7 with size 10 thread **materials ** use one of the following no yardage given clark s o n t mercerized crochet *21 balls * j & p coats mercerized crochet *15 balls * clark s o n t or j & p coats big ball best six cord mercerized crochet *9 balls*
